name: UNET Roll A Ball
description:
Here is the complete project from my UNET tutorial making Multiplayer Roll A Ball. I struggled learning UNET and could not find a simple tutorial that uses the method that I learned in Game Design class. I hope this will shed some light with those who are struggling with UNET like I did. This is not exactly like the one made in the Youtube Series. The only difference is the name of some things. 

Youtube: 

Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/the_phantom3
